title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Boehner book. A year after George Floyd and here we go again. Minnesota governor, St. Paul mayor call for vengeance against police. Rush on how Democrat social programs have destroyed the black community. Rush and Heather Mac Donald on the leftist war against cops. Rush on the Democrat double standard on the Capitol Hill event on January 6th vs. the countless BLM riots and rioters who go unpunished. Kathryn will join the show this Friday to present another Great American Business award.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

J&J vaccine pause recommended because six women out of millions of people vaccinated had blood clots. Rush on our overreaction to the coronavirus and abandonment on federalist principles, fueled by leftists during the pandemic. Inflation is rising, but that's no surprise to anyone who's been listening to Rush. Rush warned us about the results of years and years of massive Democrat spending and the Fed printing money. Biden thinks tax increases are patriotic. Raising taxes doesn't increase revenue. The migration of liberals to conservative states is turning more states blue.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

CNN says "climate refugees" are leaving the coasts and moving to the Midwest. Rush nuked the concept of "climate refugees." Former Californian who has moved to Florida calls the show. Rush on militant wacko environmentalism as the new home for communists after the fall of the Soviet Union. EIB High Note on hero firefighter. Small business owner on inflationary spending, artificially low interest rates.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
